title: Canada's Potash withdraws offer for German rival K+S
text:
Published By: Charlotte Observer: Business - Today 
Potash Corp. of Canada has withdrawn a takeover offer for salt and potash producer K+S AG that valued the German-based company at 7.85 billi... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
